column4: Hi guys, Can someone help me? :) no sound on ubuntu netbook on sony vaio but mainly need to get hdmi output to my tv but plug the cord in and nothing happens? works fine on windows..
you plug in the cord and there is no video?
maybe one of the function keys has a rectangle with two bars on either side of it?
on my HP laptop, it is f4
i pressed all my F keys lol, in the taskbar were displays are i detect monitors but only laptop screen is on there.. is there somewhere i need to set the hdmi up?
did you press the fn key also?
what really ticked me off is that I had to change sound settings to get audio through hdmi :-\
i have no audio... i have played with alsa and nothing :( but it only really matters if i get picture/sound onto my tv threw hdmi because thats all i use... where is the FN key though? lol
no luck.. :( ill try google some more

maybe it would help if i install my nvidia drivers first lol, i know its nvidia geforce but not sure what else, is there a way to detect it? seeing as nvidia only supports auto detection on there website for windows
i need to restart now.. i'll be back shortly as i think im slowly getting there ;D thank you very much
